attributes.action: Bestow a Knighthood upon Terry Maher (sat on St Pancras roof as a loyal Subject)
attributes.background: Terry Maher is the great patriot who climbed onto St Pancras' roof to protest our betrayal through illegal extension of our leave date under Article 50 by Communist traitors. Rather than being charged he should be honoured and granted a Knighthood for risking his life to stand against Collaborators

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here: 
https://www.gov.uk/honours
